errorDialog.header: An unexpected error occurred while communicating with the server.
errorDialog.unsavedContents: Please note that unsaved content will not be saved when reloading. If you have unsaved content on this page, you can close this message and copy the content to the clipboard before reloading.
errorDialog.reportIssue: If the problem persists, contact issues@edelphi.org by email. Please include technical details in to the email to speed up resolution of the problem.

query.quickNavigationTitle: Skip question without saving and move to page:
query.noAnswer: You have not answered the question

commentEditor.title: Elaborate on this topic (add a comment)

comments.title: Comments
comments.confirmRemoveText: Are you sure that you want to delete comment "{0}" including all its replies?

queryEditor.removeQueryAnswersConfirm: Are you sure that you want to remove all answers from this query?

anonymousLoginDialog.title: Anonymous login
anonymousLoginDialog.helpText: It is possible to log in to this query using an anonymous login method.
anonymousLoginDialog.hintText: Users can sign in either by displaying a QR code on their mobile device or by copying a link to their browser. You can also download the image to your own computer and print it, for example

copyQueryDialog.title: Copy query
copyQueryDialog.helpText: Select whether the query will be copied with or without data and name the copy of selected query and select a panel where you want the query to be copied.
copyQueryDialog.emailDialogMessage: Query is copied in the background. You will be notified about the completion of the copy into the email you specified in your profile

liveView.selectQueryAndPage: Select a query and a page

reports.title: Query Results
reports.reportToEmailTitle: The report will be sent by email
reports.reportToEmailMessageDelivery: The report will be sent to the email you specified in your profile
reports.reportToEmailMessageDeliveryTime: The report arrives in 5 - 30 minutes from the request
reports.reportToEmailMessageLeave: Report is generated in the background so you are now free to navigate from this view

inviteUsers.title: Invite Users To Panel
inviteUsers.passwordHeader: A default password will be generated for new users
inviteUsers.invitationsSentText: {0} invitations have been added to send queue and will be delivered soon to panelists.

inviteBlock.title: Invite / Add Users
inviteBlock.addUsersWithoutInvitationLabel: Add Users Directly (Invitation will not be sent)
inviteBlock.mailTemplate:
You have been invited to an eDelphi panel [PANEL NAME]. To accept the invitation, please click the link below:

[ACCEPT URL]

To decline the invitation, please click the link below:

[DECLINE URL]

Note that after declining, you won't get any more e-mail notifications about the panel. If you decline an invitation by accident, you can still accept it by clicking the accept link.

Please notice that the links are personal! Do NOT share them to others.

Best Regards,
[SENDER NAME]
inviteBlock.acceptReplaceMissing: The invitation is missing an accept link. Please add "[ACCEPT URL]" to the invitation text
